message.body: Hey! If you're still up for getting painted tonight, let me know! 9 sounds great
Ok I want to do more than just paint to, but if I have to be nude I'll be more comfortable if you are to :)
Oh I was looking forward to that haha but cool maybe we can drink some wine u have
I don't have wine sorry :( also drinking makes it difficult for me to paint
You'd be shirtless tho not naked, and I already have the painting started. I'd pay you for your time
Your call, no pressure. My show is in a month, and will be hung at the Last drop and the Crane building w Brice petersons work
Let me know if you can make it! It would prob be two hours, 30dollars, but you Don't need to stay still or anything, you just lounge since the pose I have so far is a lounging pose
The green line number 13 leaves you off right in front of my house
Ok I'm coming after practice so I'll be a little sore
You lay on the bed basically- the painting is of two people on the beach
So you'd be the person on the beach towel ha!
Eta if you're still making it?
Booo k guess you're not making it. If you want to do this some other time, let me know.
I will still come just a little later, I have to go to this drum circle thingy with my homies...u have a bed time?
Booo I just made other plans bc I assumed you weren't down. Let's do this some other night. text whenever. Nights work for me. It should be fun.
